name: Black Orbit
description:
This game was made during the 7 days of Qazi's qazijam9.5.

controls:

  • Keyboard:
    • W A S D - Move
    • Space - shoot
  • Controller (only xbox for now):
    • left-stick - move
    • A - shoot
  • Generel controls:
    • Escape - pause

I personally recommend playing Black Orbit with a controller, but this is completely up to you, the player. Hope you like this game!

Known bugs:

  • Playing on anything but 1920x1080 moves the slider in options menu around, but ain't no biggie
  • Score is shown in the main menu

Credits:

  • Music - SiriusBeatsTV: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzIvArw09BmICMQFC...
